mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.time AS "time", a.request_url AS "requestUrl", a.num AS "num", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAVEL_QPS_URL( id, time, request_url, num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{time}, #{requestUrl}, #{num}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAVEL_QPS_URL SET time = #{time}, request_url = #{requestUrl}, num = #{num}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
